comment:
>>39229128
Going to have to end soon, unfortunately.

You heft one of the spikes, before Kainzo takes it. It's heavy, and about the length of your arm. You can't imagine what it might be used for.

Aelriss pulls out a chair. “I'm gonna rest a bit before we move on. In-game, that is.”

“I feel like we could all stand to take a moment.” Kainzo responds. “I'm alright on HP... but feeling a bit tired, all of a sudden.”

“Right, then I'm going to have a look at that other room.” You nod.

“I'll come with.” Nel responds. “The buddy system never fails.”

The room at the end of the hallway opens into a short, concrete staircase downward. You can see the walls from above, here. There's no mistaking it; this is the same room as in the picture you're carrying.

What will you do?
> Other
name: Sylvetica
